trans-unit.source: Provides the logic to establish a timer and to wait, asynchronously, for timer's expiration.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a lógica para estabelecer um temporizador e esperar, de forma assíncrona, a expiração do temporizador.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When notified that its timer has expired, a DelayActivity completes its execution.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Quando for notificado de que o timer expirar, DelayActivity conclui sua execução.

trans-unit.source: You can set a time out on the DelayActivity so that your workflow pauses before resuming execution.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir um tempo limite em DelayActivity para que o fluxo de trabalho faz uma pausa antes de continuar a execução.

trans-unit.source: You specify the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> using <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: Você especifica o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>uso <xref:System.TimeSpan>.</xref:System.TimeSpan> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: This causes your workflow to pause until the specified <xref:System.TimeSpan> has elapsed.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que o fluxo de trabalho Pausar especificado <xref:System.TimeSpan>expirou.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The DelayActivity class runs the code method associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration> event before the activity starts and the code-beside method can be used to initialize the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A classe DelayActivity executa o método de código associado a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration>evento antes do início da atividade e o método ao lado do código pode ser usado para inicializar o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration>

trans-unit.source: The DelayActivity is guaranteed to complete no sooner than the indicated <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>.
trans-unit.target: DelayActivity é garantido para ser concluída sem antes que o indicado <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The delay can take longer because the timer notification might occur some time after the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> is reached.
trans-unit.target: O atraso pode levar mais tempo porque a notificação de timer pode ocorrer algum tempo após o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>for atingido.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: One reason for a longer delay is if the workflow is running under high system stress in a server environment.
trans-unit.target: Um motivo para um atraso mais longo é se o fluxo de trabalho está sendo executado na sobrecarga do sistema de alta em um ambiente de servidor.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity"> </xref> classe usando o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome definido pelo usuário da atividade.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the time-out duration starts.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes do início da duração do tempo limite.

trans-unit.source: This event should not be used to set the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> for a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não deve ser usado para definir o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>para <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The time-out duration should be set in the workflow's `InitializeComponent` method instead.
trans-unit.target: A duração do tempo limite deve ser definida no fluxo de trabalho `InitializeComponent` método em vez disso.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the workflow queue that will be delivered when the timer expires.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da fila de fluxo de trabalho que será entregue quando o timer expira.

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow queue is set by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O nome da fila de fluxo de trabalho é definido <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A>método.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow queue.
trans-unit.target: O nome da fila de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Creates the subscription of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity"></xref> to an event.
trans-unit.target: Cria a assinatura do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity"> </xref> a um evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> that represents the execution environment of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> que representa o ambiente de execução do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventHandler> for the parent event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.EventHandler>para o evento pai.</xref:System.EventHandler>

trans-unit.source: parentContext or parentEventHandler is .
trans-unit.target: parentContextor parentEventHandler is .

trans-unit.target: Cancela a assinatura do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity"> </xref> a um evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the duration of the delay in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define a duração do atraso no fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The time period set in this property determines the time the workflow will sit idle before the workflow proceeds to the next activity.
trans-unit.target: O período de tempo definido nessa propriedade determina a hora em que o fluxo de trabalho ficará ocioso antes que o fluxo de trabalho prossiga para a próxima atividade.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that indicates the length of the delay in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.TimeSpan>que indica o tempo de atraso no fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration*> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> que tem como destino o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration*>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration*>
